description:
The Mullvad VPN client app.

Requires an account number obtainable from [Mullvad's website]. A three hour
trial is provided when creating a new account. The account can be paid for
using anonymous methods such as cash and cryptocurrency. According to the
[VPN policy], this VPN doesn't keep logs.

[Mullvad's website]: https://mullvad.net/en/account/create/
[VPN policy]: https://mullvad.net/en/guides/no-logging-data-policy/
author: Amagicom AB
